snippet.title: Steal It Gameplay trailer
snippet.description:
Steal It is an online multiplayer game in which it depends on who has the most coins at the end of a round.

Coins can either be obtained as rewards by completing tasks or by stealing coins from other players.

The game has two game modes. A team mode and a free for all mode.

In team mode there are two teams. One tries to get the coins by completing tasks while the other tries to steal them undetected by the players. The players have the opportunity to track down the thieves and lock them up in prison.

In the free for all mode, everyone is on their own. In a certain time interval, the abilities that can be used change. You can either steal or perform tasks.

Steal It is available on Steam and Epic Games Store
